channel.title: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command

item.title: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

it dont work my looky like this, its frustrating, anyway’s im also having a problem getting rid of a command ::master, i have tried deleting it from client.java, but it somehow stays.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights >= 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell(""+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } 
    if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 0 && donator == 1)  {
            String text = command.substring(5);
            yell(""+playerName+":  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
    }</blockquote>

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command

item.title: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command
item.dc:creator: @skatersscape skatersscape
item.description:
@skatersscape wrote:

Take out the yell you got now and…

Add this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights >= 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell(""+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Then add this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 0 && donator == 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell(""+playerName+": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command
item.dc:creator: @skatersscape skatersscape
item.description:
@skatersscape wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is how it would go:

if (command.startsWith("yell") || playerRights == 1 || playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3 || donator == 1)) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Owner - Johnny]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

item.title: How can i make ::yell a donator,mod,admin command
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

okay so i want to make my yell a donator, mod, and admin command, so far i have

}

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

i’ve changed like all the numbers in there to a 1, but get the same thing. so help me please.
